rooms.description: Brutalist style with raw concrete finishes and floor-to-ceiling windows emphasizing natural light; designed in accordance with Vastu principles for energy flow.
Spacious open area with exposed structural elements, incorporating brutalist aesthetics. Large window openings provide panoramic views while ensuring proper sunlight alignment as per local norms.
Functional kitchen with integrated storage and floor-to-ceiling windows on one side to maximize light; designed in a Brutalist style with emphasis on durability and natural materials.
Adjacent to the living room, this area features raw textures and robust concrete surfaces, with a large window providing natural illumination in line with Vastu guidelines.

openings.details: A grand entrance featuring floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance light and adherence to Vastu.
Balcony with continuous glass facade promoting ventilation and a connection with the outdoors, following local building norms.
